reviewText: This game is sort of like Warcraft-lite, in a sense. It's been years since I played it, so my memory might be hazy, but I did play it to completion and remember it being serviceable, if a bit buggy (IE, one map required me to defend a building with my Hero unit and a few basic infantrymen, and all of the infantrymen died, except for one that somehow got 20 levels ahead of everybody else and became death personified). If you want some kind of RTS-lite type of fantasy game to amuse yourself for a weekend, then go for it, and if you don't like it you're only out ten bucks. Otherwise, stick with Warcraft or Spellforce or something.\n\nI'll reccomend it, but it's sort of a 'meh' reccomendation than a ZOMG GET IT NAO" one. It works and it's amusing
date: but other games have done it better."

reviewText: Wow this game is really bad,  The Grfx are  ok but the camera is zoomed in too far.  You use right click to move.\nYou have to constantly fight your units including your hero to not blindly rush into a large agro mob.   Really hard to figure out how to do combos and really not worth figuring it out.\nOver all its a no go for me!  Beware.

reviewText: You can tell this would have been a potentially fun game but its ruined with unpolished mechanics/graphics/everything and the ultimate feeling that it feels like Warcraft 0.5\n\nFor a large part of the time I played I could not even figure out how to use more than 1 combo. The tutorial is pretty straight-forward and clear but yes, even the tutorial feels like an unfinished product to me

reviewText:
This is a wanna be RPG/Hack n' Slash/Semi RTS game. Basically its an attempt at Warcraft, with more emphisis on the hero.

Graphics - 3/5
Gameplay - 2/5
Sound - 3/5
Replay Value - 1/5

There are much better games out there.

reviewText: 12 minotes was all I could take.  Clunky interface, clunky camera, annoying and repetitive character vocalizations. The first NPC I met had some of the worst voice acting I've encountered recently. Uninstalled.
Wish I had seen/read the negative reviews before I bought it
